第三十一戦隊で大型艦を南沙\n諸島まで護衛、さらに比島方\n面地上作戦を支援後、:
Escort large ships to the
Nansha Islands with the
31st Squadron, and after
supporting the operation
in the Philippines Area,
search and destroy enemy
submarines in the area!
潜水艦を基軸戦力とした第六\n艦隊をソロモン海域へ展開！\n第三艦隊と共に敵水上:
Deploy the 6th Fleet, with
submarines as its main
force, to the Solomon Sea!
Together with the 3rd Fleet,
control the enemy surface
forces, and capture and
destroy the enemy ships!
精鋭水雷戦隊により友軍陸上\n部隊への鼠輸送作戦を実施！\n同輸送を阻止せんとす:
With an elite torpedo
squadron, conduct a Rat
Transport Operation for
friendly land forces! If
you encounter an enemy
attempting to block this
transport, destroy it!
第三十一戦隊、これよりマニラを抜錨、\nルソン方面に出撃す！:
31st Squadron, setting sail from Manilla,
sortieing to the Luzon front!
ソロモン最前線へ、鼠輸送を敢行する！:
To the front lines of the Solomons,
carrying out a Rat Transport Operation!
第三艦隊、出撃する！対空警戒を厳に！:
3rd Fleet, sortieing!
Maintain high anti-aircraft alert!
二水戦、鉄底海峡に突入する！合戦用意！:
DesRon2, entering Iron Bottom Strait!
Battle stations!
敵巡洋艦部隊、発見！揚陸止め！\n全軍、戦闘準備！突撃せよ！:
Enemy cruiser force spotted!
Stop the landing!
All troops, prepare for battle! Charge!
